title: Love You Self-Evident
overview: Mo Ningxi, who had experienced betrayal and forced to leave the country, returned in a splendid manner after six years, accompanied by her adorable child, as a renowned fashion designer. Her sole purpose was to uncover the truth behind her mother's death and reclaim everything that belonged to her. Unexpectedly, she crossed paths with Li Xicheng. The bitchy sister and the wicked stepmother continuously plotted against her, but she was unexpectedly saved by him. From then on, she became the apple of his eye, and he was determined to marry her forcefully. However, she refused to become a stepmother. Fortunately, with the assistance of the three divine treasures, Long Feng San Bao, Mo Ningxi and Li Xicheng finally came together after six years. The conspiracy from six years ago and the truth behind her mother's death were also revealed.
